title: Lynda- Up and Running with Photoshop CS6
description:
Up and Running with Photoshop CS6
3h 49m Beginner May 14, 2012



Adobe Photoshop is more than just an image editing applicationÃ¢â‚¬â€it is a foundational staple in all the visual arts, from print design, to photography, to web design, to motion graphics and 3D graphics. In this course, Adobe Certified Instructor Chad Perkins covers the basics of Photoshop. Learn about the components of visual images, making selections, color correcting, fixing images, outputting images, and much more. This course uses Photoshop CS6, but the information presented is applicable to all versions of the application.
Topics include:

    Getting images into Photoshop
    Creating and navigating documents
    Working with layers
    Cropping and straightening images
    Color correction
    Making selections
    Fixing image problems
    Working with effects
    Creating and editing text
    Exporting and printing
